comments.value: #Scenario: Business rule through list of steps with arguments.
#Background: List of steps run before each of the scenarios

steps.name: I navigate to energy comparethemarket website
I wait for "3" seconds
I click on Find postcode button after I enter postcode as "PE2 6YS"
I wait for "5" seconds
Website accepts it and displays option to "change-postcode" if needed
I click on "no-bill-label" as i have my bill handy
I click on Electricity only label as i want to compare electricity only
I select "Ecotricity" as my current electricity supplier from the drop down option
I click on Next button at below right
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to energy page
I check the Yes checkbox as i use pre-payment meter
I check the No checkbox as i do not have an Economy 7 meter
I select electricity current spend period as "Monthly" from drop down option
I enter the value "40" as current electricity spend in the given textbox
I click on the Next button at below right to navigate to preferences and contact details page
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to preferences and contact details page
I click on Fixed tariff label to choose the tariff i am interested in
I enter my email address as "def@gmail.com" in the given textbox
I check the given check box to confirm that i have read and undrestood terms and conditions
I click on Go to prices button at below right
I wait for "10" seconds
I should be able to navigate to results page
I see filter recommendation subheading as "Recommended tariffs for you"
I check postcode "PE2 6YS" i have entered displayed under supplier details section
I check if it is showing "Ecotricity" as my electricity supplier under supplier details section
I check if it is showing Projection as "40.00 monthly" under energy usage section
I check if it is showing Projection as "480 annually" under energy usage section
I see filter results heading as "Personalise your results"
I check if Fixed tariff type checkbox is checked under Personalise your results section
I check if Variable tariff type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I see filter recommendation subheading as "Recommended tariffs for you"
I see "Supplier" heading available under recomendation subheading
I see "Annual saving" heading available next to Supplier heading
I see "Estimated bill" heading available next to Annual saving heading
I see "Tariff type" heading available next to Estimated bill heading
I see "Payment type" heading available next to Tariff type heading
I See "Supplier rating" heading available next to Payment type heading
I should be able to see tariff results
I close the browser

name: Web :: User Energy Comparison journey
description:
In order to collate the information required to get quotes from companies that provide the energy 
As a user
I want a website which will allow me to search with different options to compare and find the best price for my energy

comments.value: #Scenario: Business rule through list of steps with arguments.
#Background: List of steps run before each of the scenarios

steps.name: I navigate to energy comparethemarket website
I wait for "3" seconds
I click on Find postcode button after I enter postcode as "PE2 6YS"
I wait for "5" seconds
Website accepts it and displays option to "change-postcode" if needed
I click on "no-bill-label" as i have my bill handy
I click on Gas only label as i want to compare gas only
I check the "I don't know" checkbox as i am not aware who is my current gas supplier is
I click on Next button at below right
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to "Your Energy" page
I check the No checkbox as i do not use pre-payment meter
I check the "I don't know" checkbox as i do not know how much i spend on gas
I click on Next button at below right to navigate to "Your energy usage" page
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to "Your energy usage" web page
I select "1-2 Bedrooms" as size of my home
I select "1-2 Occupants" as no of people live at house
I select "Other heating" as my main source of energy for heating
I select "Tropical" as temperature i keep at home
I select "Well wrapped" to describe insulation at my home
I select "Electricity" as my main source of energy for cooking
I select "Evening and weekends" to answer when someone stay at home
I click on the Next button at below right to navigate to personal details page
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to preferences and contact details page
I click on Variable tariff label to choose the tariff i am interested in
I click on Monthly direct debit label to choose payment type i am interested in
I enter my email address as "ghi@gmail.com" in the given textbox
I check the given check box to confirm that i have read and undrestood terms and conditions
I click on Go to prices button at below right
I wait for "10" seconds
I should be able to navigate to results page
I check postcode "PE2 6YS" i have entered displayed under supplier details section
I check if it is showing "British Gas" as my default gas supplier under supplier details section
I see filter results heading as "Personalise your results"
I check if Fixed tariff type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I check if Variable tariff type checkbox is checked under Personalise your results section
I check if Monthly Payment type checkbox is checked under Personalise your results section
I check if Quarterly Payment type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I check if Pay on receipt of bill Payment type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I see filter recommendation subheading as "Recommended tariffs for you"
I see "Supplier" heading available under recomendation subheading
I see "Annual saving" heading available next to Supplier heading
I see "Estimated bill" heading available next to Annual saving heading
I see "Tariff type" heading available next to Estimated bill heading
I see "Payment type" heading available next to Tariff type heading
I See "Supplier rating" heading available next to Payment type heading
I should be able to see tariff results
I close the browser

name: Web :: User Energy Comparison journey
description:
In order to collate the information required to get quotes from companies that provide the energy 
As a user
I want a website which will allow me to search with different options to compare and find the best price for my energy

comments.value: #Scenario: Business rule through list of steps with arguments.
#Background: List of steps run before each of the scenarios

steps.name: I navigate to energy comparethemarket website
I wait for "3" seconds
I click on Find postcode button after I enter postcode as "PE2 6YS"
I wait for "5" seconds
Website accepts it and displays option to "change-postcode" if needed
I click on "have-bill-label" as i have my bill handy
I click on Gas & Electricity as i want to compare both
I check the No checkbox as my gas & electricity are not from the same supplier
I click on EDF Energy as my current electricity supplier
I click on British Gas as my current gas supplier
I click on Next button at below right
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to energy electricity page
I select "Simply Fixed Apr20" as my current electricity tariff under drop down option
I check the Yes checkbox as i have an Economy 7 meter
I select "Monthly Direct Debit" as my electricity method of pay under drop down option
I check the Yes checkbox to indicate that electricity as my main source of heating
I check the kWh checkbox to give my current electricty usgae
I select "Annually" as option from drop down to enter day electricity usage
I enter the value "240" as day electricity usage in the given textbox
I enter the value "120" as night electricity usage in the given textbox
I click on Next button at below right to navigate to Gas energy page
I wait for "3" seconds

result.error_message:
org.junit.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[Gas]> but was:<[]>
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:115)
	at org.junit.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:144)
	at com.test.steps.EnergyGasStepDef.i_should_be_able_to_navigate_to_energy_gas_page(EnergyGasStepDef.java:26)
	at .Then I should be able to navigate to energy gas page(compareGasElectricity.feature:44)

steps.name: I should be able to navigate to energy gas page
I select "HomeEnergy Fix July 2019" as my current gas tariff under drop down option
I select "Monthly Direct Debit" as my gas method of pay under drop down option
I check the No checkbox to indicate that gas is not my main source of heating
I check the kWh checkbox to give my current gas usgae
I select "Annually" as option from drop down to enter current gas usage
I enter the value "340" as current gas usage in the given textbox
I click on the Next button at below right to navigate to preferences and contact details page
I wait for "3" seconds
I should be able to navigate to preferences and contact details page
I click on All tariffs option to choose the tariff i am interested in
I click on All payment types option to choose payment type i am interested in
I enter my email address as "abc@gmail.com" in the given textbox
I check the given check box to confirm that i have read and undrestood terms and conditions
I click on Go to prices button at below right
I wait for "5" seconds
I should be able to navigate to results page
I see filter recommendation subheading as "Recommended tariffs for you"
I check postcode "PE2 6YS" i have entered displayed under supplier details section
I check if it is showing "EDF Energy" as my electricity supplier under supplier details section
I check if it is showing "British Gas" as my gas supplier under supplier details section
I check if it is showing Electricity as "360 kWh" under energy usage section
I check if it is showing Gas as "340 kWh" under energy usage section
I see filter results heading as "Personalise your results"
I check if Fixed tariff type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I check if Variable tariff type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I check if Monthly Payment type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I check if Quarterly Payment type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I check if Pay on receipt of bill Payment type checkbox is unchecked under Personalise your results section
I see filter recommendation subheading as "Recommended tariffs for you"
I see "Supplier" heading available under recomendation subheading
I see "Annual saving" heading available next to Supplier heading
I see "Estimated bill" heading available next to Annual saving heading
I see "Tariff type" heading available next to Estimated bill heading
I see "Payment type" heading available next to Tariff type heading
I See "Supplier rating" heading available next to Payment type heading
I should be able to see tariff results
I close the browser
